div.h2: The latest updates on the Coronavirus

div.div: The latest information and updates on the Coronavirus

img.alt: The latest information and updates on the Coronavirus

p.style: line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(35, 31, 32); font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;
p.span: As a school division, PPS works closely with both the local and state Health Department. In addition, staff has been monitoring all reports from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) to stay abreast of any new updates regarding the Coronavirus.

p.style: line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(35, 31, 32); font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;

span.style: font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

br.span: To learn more about the proactive steps is taking to prevent the spread of the Coronavirus and to read answers to the division's Frequently Asked Questions, visit PPS's dedicated Coronavirus webpage.
